All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    BBQChicken
    The BBQChicken class extends the abstract Pizza class.
    BuildYourOwn
    The BuidlYourOwn class extends the abstract Pizza class.
    CartActivity
    The CartActivity class is the controller class for the activity_cart.xml page.
    ChicagoActivity
    The ChicagoActivity class is the controller for the activity_chicago.xml page.
    ChicagoPizza
    The ChicagoPizza class implements the PizzaFactory interface.
    Crust
    The Crust enum defines different types of crusts
    Customizable
    The Customizable interface defines the methods to add and remove items from a customizable object
    Deluxe
    The Deluxe class extends the abstract Pizza class.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity class is the controller for the activity_main.xml file This class initializes UI components and handles user interaction events
    Meatzza
    The Meatzza class extends the abstract Pizza class.
    NewYorkActivity
    The NewYorkActivity class is the controller for the activity_new_york page.
    NYPizza
    The NYPizza class implements the PizzaFactory interface.
    Order
    The Order class represents an order of one or more pizzas and uniquely identified by an integer id.
    Pizza
    The Pizza class is an abstract class that implements the Customizable interface.
    PizzaFactory
    The PizzaFactory interface defines the methods to create different types of pizzas
    PizzaItemActivity
    The PizzaItemActivityClass is the controller for the activity_pizza_item.xml, which is a single pizza in the activity_cart.xml.
    PizzaItemAdapter
    The PizzaItemAdapter class binds the information about the pizzas in the current order with items in the recycler view of activity_cart.xml
    PizzaItemAdapter.ItemsHolder
    Get the views from the row layout file, similar to the onCreate() method.
    Size
    The Size enum defines the different size options of a pizza
    StoreOrder
    The StoreOrder class implements the Customizable interface and contains a list of all orders of a store.
    StoreOrdersActivity
    The StoreOrdersActivity class is the controller for the activity_store_orders.xml page.
    Topping
    The Topping enum contains all possible pizza toppings
    ToppingActivity
    The ToppingActivity class is the controller for the activity_topping.xml, which is a single topping in the Chicago and NY Pizza activities.
    ToppingsAdapter
    The ToppingsAdapter class binds the topping options with items in the recycler views in the Chicago and New York activities
    ToppingsAdapter.ItemsHolder
    Get the views from the row layout file, similar to the onCreate() method.
